robot

Class Tests

  • java.lang.Object
    • robot.Tests

  • public final class Tests
extends java.lang.Object
    Assembly functions - class Tests
    Provides the funcions for making boolean comparisons between elements inside the stack of the virtual Machine. Also verifies if an element is or not Nil.
    Author:
    Renato Cordeiro Ferreira
    See Also:
    Ctrl

      • NIL

        static void NIL(RVM rvm)
         throws StackUnderflowException,
                WrongTypeException
        Assembly funcion NIL.
        Takes out the top of the main stack and pushes 1 if it is Nil and 0, otherwise.
        Parameters:
        rvm - Virtual Machine
        Throws:
        StackUnderflowException
        WrongTypeException

      • EQ

        static void EQ(RVM rvm)
        throws WrongTypeException,
               StackUnderflowException
        Assembly funcion EQ.
        Compares the two top most elements of the virtual machine's main stack.

        If numerical, checks if their value are the same. In the other case, Checks if they have the same type.

        Parameters:
        rvm - Virtual Machine
        Throws:
        WrongTypeException
        StackUnderflowException

      • NE

        static void NE(RVM rvm)
        throws StackUnderflowException,
               WrongTypeException
        Assembly funcion NEQ.
        Compares the two top most elements of the virtual machine's main stack.

        If numerical, checks if their value are different. In the other case, Checks if they have different types.

        Parameters:
        rvm - Virtual Machine
        Throws:
        WrongTypeException
        StackUnderflowException
